backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and admin-gated video CRUD with URL validation and public read queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping splash-page-related features to frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map summarizing all frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens and dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing splash/home/manage views, admin gating, navigation, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAuthCo: UI controls for admin sign-in and clearing admin access, integrating state checks and dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTokenD: Modal dialog for entering and validating admin tokens with error handling and success callbacks.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserAuthBut: Provides a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity, handling login state, errors, and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with background image, heading, description, and an Explore button.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeView.ts: Renders the homepage with hero section and genre‑grouped video rows, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing branding, navigation buttons, user auth, and admin controls based on permissions.
frontend/src/components/manage/ManageVid: Admin‑only video management page that lists videos, shows loading/error states, and opens the add/edit form.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoForm: Form for creating or editing videos, including validation, YouTube URL parsing, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/manage/VideoList: Displays a video entry with thumbnail, metadata, edit and delete actions, and a confirmation dialog for deletion.
frontend/src/components/splash/SplashVie: Intro splash screen with animated visuals, logo, title, and a button to continue into the app.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Video thumbnail card that opens a video player dialog when clicked and shows basic video details.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoPlay: Displays a dialog with video title, description, and an embedded YouTube iframe player.
Renders a horizontally scrollable row of VideoCards with left/right navigation buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides a hook to check if the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Manages session-based admin tokens, applying or clearing them and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideos.ts: Provides hooks for listing, creating, updating, and deleting videos via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, and utility classes like scrollbar hiding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and generates thumbnail URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theming extensions, custom colors, animations, and enables typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, and project state for the TV Streaming Network app.
